channel.title: higgsfield_ai TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from higgsfield_ai

item.title: Now, camera work isn’t limited by physics. Introducing Higgsfield Mix - combine multiple motion controls in a single shot, including moves that aren’t possible with real cameras 🧩 Also dropping 10 new motion controls built for speed, tension, and cinemat
item.description: Now, camera work isn’t limited by physics. Introducing Higgsfield Mix - combine multiple motion controls in a single shot, including moves that aren’t possible with real cameras 🧩 Also dropping 10 new motion controls built for speed, tension, and cinemat

item.title: Introducing Higgsfield Pulse - a high-energy collection of iconic human movements 🧩 Skate flips, boxing punches, basketball dunks, baseball kicks, and more.
item.description: Introducing Higgsfield Pulse - a high-energy collection of iconic human movements 🧩 Skate flips, boxing punches, basketball dunks, baseball kicks, and more.

item.title: Introducing Turbo - our fastest model yet. 1.5x faster renders, 30% cheaper. Priority queue. Perfect for rapid iteration🧩 Available now via the link in bio
item.description: Introducing Turbo - our fastest model yet. 1.5x faster renders, 30% cheaper. Priority queue. Perfect for rapid iteration🧩 Available now via the link in bio

item.title: With over 80 cinematic camera motions and the ability to mix them however you want, you get full directorial control. We just added 7 more to the Library🧩 Drop a motion you love or one you’re excited to try in the comments

item.title: OpenAI’s image generation model is now in Higgsfield 🧩 Transform any prompt or image into over 30 iconic styles like Ghibli or Simpsons, then animate with cinematic camera motion in seconds. One platform for everything. Try it now via the link in bio

item.title: Introducing a new feature in Higgsfield: Start & End Frames 🧩 It lets you upload a beginning image and an ending image to define the structure of your video. No more loops or generative randomness. Available now - link in bio.
item.description: Introducing a new feature in Higgsfield: Start & End Frames 🧩 It lets you upload a beginning image and an ending image to define the structure of your video. No more loops or generative randomness. Available now - link in bio.

item.title: The Global Higgsfield Creative Challenge is LIVE! $15,000 prize pool. 25 winners. 50% OFF for all new users. Post a video, tag @higgsfield.ai, add the hashtag #HiggsfieldSpotlight, and share it to your stories to participate!
